description: HTML, CSS, PHP, JS, and more

content.title: Republishing
content.quote: A simple button that, when clicked, shares the republishing guidelines and an option to copy the automatically generated, guideline-compliant HTML.

content.title: Mailchimp Slack Bots
content.quote: An open-source repository containing bots which post MailChimp newsletter metrics into Slack.

content.title: 2024 Voter Guide
content.quote: Viewed by millions of Californians, this guide iterates on the 2022 version to provide clearer navigation and a focused reading experience.

content.title: CalMatters' Homepage
content.quote: Previously unbearable on tablet, the homepage redesign simplifies and standardizes the sections, even highlighting the donation ask.

content.title: Digital Democracy
content.quote: Behind the scenes, queryable custom taxonomies allow legislator and bill pages to promote recent CalMatters stories.

content.title: Legislator Cards
content.quote: Designed to connect directly to Digital Democracy, these cards are built on a custom taxonomy, making them easy to insert and update.

content.title: 2022 Voter Guide
content.quote: Delivered on a tight deadline to make the primaries, this guide combined ACF blocks and native elements to simplify the editorial workflow.

content.title: Guest Author Override
content.quote: A custom field that allows editors to display guest author names on archive pages and articles instead of "Guest Commentary".

content.title: Archive Pages
content.quote: What started as a new layout for categories became the standard for all archive pages (tags, authors, custom taxonomies) with some minimal adjustments where needed.

content.title: Navigation
content.quote: Moving away from the classic slide-out sidebar menu, rebuilding the navigation included restyling the footer, adding a full-screen hamburger menu, and introducing the topics bar.

content.title: Series
content.quote: Presented to users as a stylized framework that connects stories together, this custom taxonomy allowed editors to publish articles using posts instead of a custom post type.

content.title: 2021 Recall Voter Guide
content.quote: Built to work with the CMS instead of against it, this guide was one of the first steps CalMatters took to simplify voter guide creation.

content.title: HTML Sitemap
content.quote: This seemingly simple page automatically connects to the WordPress archives through a custom template and rewrite rules.

content.title: TacoBots
content.quote: The open-source repository of The Texas Tribune's Slack bots contains not only an AWS lambda functions for each bot, but also a limerick.

content.title: North By Northwestern Housing Guide
content.quote: This simple guide to the Northwestern's housing combines classic information with an updated filtering system and compatibility calculation.

content.title: North By Northwestern Winter Magazine: 2020
content.quote: The simple compilation of North By Northwestern's winter magazine articles.

content.title: Political Quiz
content.quote: A political quiz created with NBN Interactive Staff and the Political Section of NBN.

content.title: Scrolling Webpage
content.quote: A scrolling article design with an incorporated video.

content.title: R Tutorial: UFO Bar Chart Challenge
content.quote: A series of chart challenges using a cleaned ufos data set. Designed for RStudio Cloud.

content.title: R Tutorial: UFOs
content.quote: A quick introduction to R and RStudio Cloud using a cleaned ufos data set.

content.title: CodePen
content.quote: A small collection of HTML and CSS builds beginning in 2018.

unpublished.title: Leaflet Map
unpublished.quote: An interactive map of Northwestern built using Leaflet.

unpublished.title: Stereographic Point Clouds
unpublished.quote: A short explanation and example of turning a pair of sterographic images into a three dimensional point cloud.
